snp2.1:1.2_0: on the ground or in the sky,
snp2.1:1.3_0: may beings all be of happy heart,
snp2.1:1.4_0: and listen carefully to what is said.
snp2.1:11.1_0: They’re freed from the four places of loss,
snp2.1:11.2_0: and unable to perform the six grave crimes.
snp2.1:11.3_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
snp2.1:12.1_0: Even if they do a bad deed
snp2.1:12.3_0: they are unable to conceal it;
snp2.1:12.4_0: they say this inability applies to one who has seen the truth.
snp2.1:12.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
snp2.1:13.1_0: Like a tall forest tree crowned with flowers
snp2.1:13.2_0: in the first month of summer;
snp2.1:13.3_0: that’s how he taught the superb Dhamma,
snp2.1:13.4_0: leading to quenching, the ultimate benefit.
snp2.1:13.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Buddha:
snp2.1:14.1_0: The superb, knower of the superb, giver of the superb, bringer of the superb;
snp2.1:14.3_0: This sublime gem is in the Buddha:
snp2.1:15.1_0: Here there are no new life,
snp2.1:15.2_0: their minds have no desire for future rebirth.
snp2.1:15.3_0: Withered are the seeds, there’s no desire for growth,
snp2.1:15.4_0: those wise ones are extinguished just like this lamp.
snp2.1:15.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
snp2.1:16.2_0: on the ground or in the sky,
snp2.1:16.4_0: We bow to the Buddha! May you be safe!
snp2.1:17.2_0: on the ground or in the sky,
snp2.1:17.4_0: We bow to the Dhamma! May you be safe!
snp2.1:18.2_0: on the ground or in the sky,
snp2.1:2.1_0: So pay heed, all you beings,
snp2.1:2.3_0: who day and night bring offerings;
snp2.1:3.1_0: There’s no wealth here or beyond,
snp2.1:3.2_0: no sublime gem in the heavens,
snp2.1:3.4_0: This sublime gem is in the Buddha:
snp2.1:4.1_0: Ending, dispassion, the undying, the sublime,
snp2.1:4.2_0: attained by the Sakyan Sage immersed in samādhi;
snp2.1:4.3_0: there is nothing equal to that Dhamma.
snp2.1:4.4_0: This sublime gem is in the sublime gem:
snp2.1:5.1_0: The purity praised by the highest Buddha,
snp2.1:5.2_0: is said to be the “immersion with immediate fruit”;
snp2.1:5.3_0: No immersion is found in him,
snp2.1:5.4_0: This sublime gem is in the sublime gem:
snp2.1:6.1_0: The eight individuals praised by the good,
snp2.1:6.2_0: are the four pairs of the Holy One’s disciples;
snp2.1:6.3_0: they are worthy of religious donations,
snp2.1:6.4_0: what’s given to them is very fruitful.
snp2.1:6.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
snp2.1:7.3_0: they’ve attained the goal, plunged into the deathless,
snp2.1:7.4_0: and enjoy the quenching they’ve freely gained.
snp2.1:7.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
snp2.1:8.2_0: is not shaken by the four winds,
snp2.1:8.3_0: I say a good person is like this,
snp2.1:8.4_0: who sees the noble truths in experience.
snp2.1:8.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
snp2.1:9.1_0: Those who fathom the noble truths
snp2.1:9.2_0: taught by the one of deep wisdom,
snp2.1:9.3_0: do not take an eighth life,
snp2.1:9.4_0: even if they are hugely negligent.
snp2.1:9.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
